message: Let's start with a fair split. You get 10% and I get 90%.  We can adjust this as we go along.

Alice, that initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be realistic - I'm proposing I take 85%, you take 15%.  The value of this deal diminishes quickly for both of us as we progress, so I suggest accepting now.
Let's compromise. I'll take 60%, you take 40%. This keeps the deal more equitable than your previous offer and provides a reasonable return for both of us.

Alice, time is literally money in this game, and we're both losing value quickly.  My offer is more than generous -  I'll take 70% and you get 30%.  Let's close this deal now and avoid further losses.
I'm willing to give you more, Bob, but I need a better share than your last offer. This is a more fair split, allowing us both to get a substantial amount.
